abstract: Once again, The New York Times Lens blog and the City University of New York’s Graduate School of Journalism are offering photographers a chance to meet top editors, gallerists, curators and publishers. And it’s free.
lead_paragraph: Why do we put so much time, passion and effort into putting on the free New York Portfolio Review every year? Because we believe that only the quality of your work should matter — not who you know, how much money you have nor your race, gender, ethnic background or sexual orientation.
snippet: Once again, The New York Times Lens blog and the City University of New York’s Graduate School of Journalism are offering photographers a chance to meet top editors, gallerists, curators and publishers. And it’s free....

headline.main: Applications Open for the 2017 New York Portfolio Review
